title: 'Matchfound' Sound Effect
body: Who made the sound effect when a match is found on the updated client? Because I can't get over how beautiful it sounds.

replies.body: Riot Eno and Riot Zimberfly have been cranking out all sorts of new sounds for the client! This will make their day :)

Idk who to address this concern to, but I guess I'll go ahead and address it to you. I was wondering if you guys could make it possible to disable the music that plays when you're waiting in queue in the new client. As of now, there's no way to disable it without disabling the login music as well.
We're looking at possibly expanding the level of granularity in the League client sound settings - hang tight!

Have you ever considered playing the key part of a champions theme on triple kills or above?
Like taking sound samples from champion themes  and interweaving them into kill feeds for when said champion?
Like "Hello I am Bird" mentioned, because not all Champs have themes, (nor do all the Factions yet,) this would be tough.

well you guys actually have a lot of songs that could easily be substitute

Demacian champions with no theme use the  "Demacia rising " theme

Shadow isle champions with no theme use the"Harrowing" theme

Shurimans use "Rise of the Ascended" theme

Freljordians use "Freljord" theme

Bilgewater champions use the "Butchers Bridge" Bilgewater theme

which means the sound team would only have to whip up some stuff for (Bandlecity/Ionia/Piltover/Zaun and Noxus)

But not all champions have champion themes. How would that work?

Would it just play a generic League theme like the Season 7/6/5 preseason song?

I imagine you could  create a theme specific to thier region and play that theme.
Like create a Demacian theme and for all the Demacians without login themes
a Shadow isle theme for all the shadow isle champs without a theme ect ect.
I don't know what "expanding the level of granularity" means, but if that includes making the Match Found tone not sound so screechy, by all means please do that.

Would it be possible with a soundboard or mp3 files so we can compare all the sounds? :)
It would be easier to give detailed feedback that way (and also make it easy to add some cool new notification sounds to my mobile :3 - currently have the old sound for "buddy invite" as my message sound <3).

Maaaaaaybe down the road a ways? There's a lot of sound work yet to be completed for the League Client; Riot Zimberfly and I are trying to get new sounds created, touch up stuff that's already in there, and polish as much as we can at the moment.

Love the idea though! =)
Hey thanks, glad you're diggin' it! <3

> Hey thanks, glad you're diggin' it! <3

Is there a way we can hear it in a separate file or something. Because every time a match is found, It takes me the full cycle to accept the match.. or maybe not. CX
